Based on the provided text, I'll extract the structured information about this research paper:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Intrahousehold dynamics of BRAC's Challenging the Frontiers of Poverty Reduction-Targeting the Ultra Poor (CFPR-TUP) program",
    "matches_expected_title": "YES"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "BRAC's Challenging the Frontiers of Poverty Reduction-Targeting the Ultra Poor (CFPR-TUP)",
    "country": "Bangladesh",
    "region": "Multiple districts including Rangpur, Netrokona, and Madaripur",
    "target_population": "Women in very poor households in rural Bangladesh",
    "program_name_citation": "In this paper, we study the impacts on intrahousehold dynamics of BRAC's Challenging the Frontiers of Poverty Reduction-Targeting the Ultra Poor (CFPR-TUP) program, which targets asset transfer (primarily livestock) and training to women in very poor households in rural Bangladesh.",
    "country_citation": "The 15 focus group discussions were conducted in three districts-5 in Rangpur, in the northwest; 5 in Netrokona, in the north; and 5 in Madaripur, in the central south of the country.",
    "target_population_citation": "In this paper, we study the impacts on intrahousehold dynamics of BRAC's Challenging the Frontiers of Poverty Reduction-Targeting the Ultra Poor (CFPR-TUP) program, which targets asset transfer (primarily livestock) and training to women in very poor households in rural Bangladesh."
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": false,
      "cash_support_type": null,
      "cash_amount": null,
      "cash_frequency": null,
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": null
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": true,
      "assets_provided": ["livestock (primarily cattle)", "productive assets"],
      "direct_provision": "YES",
      "assets_evidence_citation": "CFPR-TUP transfers resources to women... by providing rural women-for whom sociocultural norms favoring female seclusion prescribe staying within the homestead-with assets that can be maintained at home. | Moreover, most of the assets transferred to women by CFPR-TUP are cattle"
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "asset ownership",
      "asset control",
      "women's empowerment",
      "intrahousehold dynamics",
      "decisionmaking power",
      "labor supply"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "Our quantitative analysis draws on survey data from a randomized controlled trial, with information collected on sex-disaggregated asset ownership and control, decisionmaking, and measures of women's autonomy.",
    "study_design": "Randomized Controlled Trial (RCT)",
    "design_evidence_citation": "Our approach to evaluating impacts of the STUP intervention takes advantage of the randomized controlled trial design of the intervention.",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2007-2012",
    "sample_size": null,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": true,
    "qualitative_methods": ["focus group discussions", "key informant interviews"],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": "Our qualitative work uses focus group discussions and key informant interviews in treatment and control communities",
    "has_cost_data": false,
    "cost_mentions": null,
    "cost_evidence_citation": null
  }
```
